title: Front End
description: I have gained expertise in a variety of front-end development technologies, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, React.js, Next.js, Tailwind, and Flutter.

title: Back End
description: I have extensive experience working with a variety of backend technologies, including Node.js (Express), PHP (Laravel), C# (.NET), and Go (Gin).

title: Cloud Computing
description: My experience with cloud computing includes working with Compute Engine, GKE, App Engine, Cloud Run, Docker, and Terraform.
